SEARCH
Package com.financial.services.revenues

Interface BudgetRevenueChanges

All Known Implementing Classes:
PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedRevenue, PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalRevenue, RegularBudgetRevenue
public interface BudgetRevenueChanges
Interface defining the necessary methods for modifying budget revenue amounts and managing the propagation of these changes across the hierarchy.

Implementing classes must handle both upward and downward distribution of changes, as well as maintaining state consistency and change history.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    implementChangesOfEqualDistribution(long change)
    Orchestrates the implementation of an amount change using the Equal Distribution strategy.
    void
    implementChangesOfPercentageAdjustment(double percentage)
    Orchestrates the implementation of an amount change using the Percentage Adjustment strategy.
    void
    keepAccountsAndBudgetTypeBeforeChange()
    Captures a snapshot of all accounts (current, parents, and children) that are about to be modified, storing them in the RevenuesHistory.
    void
    setAmountOfAllSubCategoriesWithEqualDistribution(long change)
    Propagates an amount change downwards to all descendant categories (subcategories) using an equal distribution logic.
    void
    setAmountOfAllSubCategoriesWithPercentageAdjustment(double percentage)
    Propagates an amount change downwards to all descendant categories (subcategories) using a percentage adjustment logic.
    void
    setAmountOfSuperCategories(long change)
    Propagates an amount change upwards to all parent categories (supercategories).
    void
    updateAmountOfSuperClassFilteredObject(long change)
    Synchronizes the change with the filtered representation of this object in the base BudgetRevenue class to ensure data consistency across views.

  • Method Details

    • implementChangesOfEqualDistribution

      void implementChangesOfEqualDistribution(long change)
      Orchestrates the implementation of an amount change using the Equal Distribution strategy. This typically involves saving history, updating the current account, and propagating the fixed change value to all related categories.
      Parameters:
      change - the fixed amount to be added or subtracted.

    • implementChangesOfPercentageAdjustment

      void implementChangesOfPercentageAdjustment(double percentage)
      Orchestrates the implementation of an amount change using the Percentage Adjustment strategy. This typically involves saving history, updating the current account, and propagating the percentage-based change to all related categories.
      Parameters:
      percentage - the percentage adjustment (e.g., 0.05 for +5%).

    • setAmountOfSuperCategories

      void setAmountOfSuperCategories(long change)
      Propagates an amount change upwards to all parent categories (supercategories).
      Parameters:
      change - the amount to be added to each ancestor's total.

    • setAmountOfAllSubCategoriesWithEqualDistribution

      void setAmountOfAllSubCategoriesWithEqualDistribution(long change)
      Propagates an amount change downwards to all descendant categories (subcategories) using an equal distribution logic.
      Parameters:
      change - the total amount to be distributed among the descendants.

    • setAmountOfAllSubCategoriesWithPercentageAdjustment

      void setAmountOfAllSubCategoriesWithPercentageAdjustment(double percentage)
      Propagates an amount change downwards to all descendant categories (subcategories) using a percentage adjustment logic.
      Parameters:
      percentage - the percentage to apply to all descendant amounts.

    • updateAmountOfSuperClassFilteredObject

      void updateAmountOfSuperClassFilteredObject(long change)
      Synchronizes the change with the filtered representation of this object in the base BudgetRevenue class to ensure data consistency across views.
      Parameters:
      change - the new total amount for the filtered object.

    • keepAccountsAndBudgetTypeBeforeChange

      void keepAccountsAndBudgetTypeBeforeChange()
      Captures a snapshot of all accounts (current, parents, and children) that are about to be modified, storing them in the RevenuesHistory. This is critical for supporting Undo operations.
